original_title: 羞恥！ジェンダーダイバーシティ推進校 本年度より毎週月曜日は、全裸登校日とする 2021年2学期特別編 白川ゆず
overview: "Listen to everyone! Starting next week, every Monday will be a naked school day! Men and women will expose their true naked bodies, and this is part of the promotion of education aimed at physical and mental health! Let's unite the class and make it successful! Boys! Don't have sexual intercourse even if you make a mistake! Also, we will carry out "classical" and "home economics" classes that are close to the test naked! Those who can't follow these school rules will drop out immediately! First of all, it's a rehearsal practice with the lower half of the body naked! "
title: How Embarrassing! At Gender Diversity Promotion School, Naked Mondays will be Starting up this Year, with a 2001 Second Semester Naked School Days Collection Available. Yuzu Shirakawa.
